statements: INSERT INTO customers (name, email, phone) VALUES ('John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone = '123-456-7890';

INSERT INTO customers (name, email, phone) VALUES ('Jane Smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', '987-654-3210') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Jane Smith', email = 'jane.smith@example.com', phone = '987-654-3210';

INSERT INTO customers (name, email, phone) VALUES ('Alice Johnson', 'alice.johnson@example.com', '555-555-5555') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Alice Johnson', email = 'alice.johnson@example.com', phone = '555-555-5555';

INSERT INTO customers (customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE customer_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890'

INSERT INTO campaigns (campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget) VALUES (1, 'Summer Sale', '2023-07-01', '2023-08-31', 10000.00) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE campaign_name='Summer Sale', start_date='2023-07-01', end_date='2023-08-31', budget=10000.00
INSERT INTO campaign_results (result_id, campaign_id, customer_id, conversion_rate, sales_amount) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 0.05, 5000.00) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE conversion_rate=0.05, sales_amount=5000.00

INSERT INTO customers (customer_id, customer_name, email) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com') ON CONFLICT (customer_id) DO UPDATE SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com';

INSERT INTO campaigns (campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget) VALUES (1, 'Summer Sale', '2022-06-01', '2022-08-31', 5000.00) ON CONFLICT (campaign_id) DO UPDATE SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale', start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-08-31', budget = 5000.00;

INSERT INTO leads (lead_id, customer_id, campaign_id, lead_name, lead_email, status) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 'Jane Smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', 'New') ON CONFLICT (lead_id) DO UPDATE SET customer_id = 1, campaign_id = 1, lead_name = 'Jane Smith', lead_email = 'jane.smith@example.com', status = 'New';

UPSERT INTO customers (customer_id, name, email, phone) VALUES (101, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone = '1234567890';

UPSERT INTO campaigns (campaign_id, name, start_date, end_date, budget) VALUES (201, 'Winter Sale', '2023-01-01', '2023-01-31', 5000.00) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Winter Sale', start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2023-01-31', budget = 5000.00;

UPSERT INTO leads (lead_id, customer_id, campaign_id, status, source) VALUES (301, 101, 201, 'New Lead', 'Website') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE customer_id = 101, campaign_id = 201, status = 'New Lead', source = 'Website';
